author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Coimbatore Kendra of Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan, founded in 1964 by eminent Gandhian and industrialist late G.K.Sundaram, completes 50 years of yeomen service this February.

The Kendra, which runs two matriculation schools at R.S.Puram and Ajjanur, will hold its golden jubilee celebrations on its R.S.Puram premises on February 6 at 6 p.m. Swami Shankarananda Saraswati of Arsha Vidya Gurukulam, will offer benediction.
title: BVB Golden Jubilee celebrations on Feb. 6
